projects.title: My-Restaurent
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application give restauret menue to the user , it's on place app , easy and interisting.

projects.title: Horned Beasts
projects.description: Gallery Of Horns. You have horned creatures displaying on the page. When you click on a beast, you increase its favorites and display it as a modal. Today we will be adding one more piece of functionality: filtering by numbers of horns.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
